                       from species")

## Solution 2

```{r title="lesson-3.R"}
df <- dbGetQuery(con, "select weight, month, plot_type, taxa
                       from surveys
                       join plots on surveys.plot_id = plots.plot_id
                       join species on surveys.species_id = species.species_id
                       where weight is not null")
```
